__e: Not even if I could leave this swamp and live like folks.
But you can't buy your way out of the swamp, and you can't buy me.
Well, maybe you'll clear out of the swamps now, so I can get a little work done.
He took us through that swamp intentionally.
After all, it was you who did the leaving in the Fire Swamp.
Unless I am wrong, and I am never wrong, they are headed dead into the Fire Swamp.
